name: Azure Cloud Storage
description: This plugin is used to deliver web transactions data to Azure platform.

configuration.label: Azure Connection String
configuration.description: Azure connection string for Authentication of Storage account.

configuration.label: Container Name
configuration.description: Container Name in which the files will be stored. Container names must start with a letter or number, and can contain only letters, numbers, and the dash  character. Every dash  character must be immediately preceded and followed by a letter or number; consecutive dashes are not permitted in container names. All letters in a container name must be lowercase. Container names must be from 3 through 63 characters long.

configuration.label: Object Prefix
configuration.description: Object prefix for the file while pushing it to Azure.

configuration.label: Maximum File Size (in MBs)
configuration.description: Maximum size of data object to be stored in the container. (Value should be between 0 to 100.)

configuration.label: Maximum Duration (in Seconds)
configuration.description: Maximum duration after which the data object should be stored in the container.
